entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump To say that you were being sarcastic when you recommended people take disinfectant for Coronavirus was sheer stupidity. Now is the time for a leader with intelligence, empathy and common sense, obviously that’s not you as you possess none of those qualities. You’re a moron!
